DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation Marketed Contact Lens Disinfectant Systems Eyelid Tissues
DOC.detailed_description: This study divide 2 period , Screening Phase Investigational Phase . During Screening Phase , subject fit dispense either ACUVUE® 2® ( current hydrogel wearer ) AIR OPTIX® AQUA ( current silicone hydrogel wearer ) contact lens use COMPLETE® MPS Easy Rub® Formula clean disinfect lens . At completion Screening Phase , symptomatic status subject re-assessed . Those subject qualify proceeded Investigational Phase dispense new pair study contact lenses identical lens wear Screening Phase use conjunction allocate study care product , CLEAR CARE® /AOSEPT® Plus ReNu MultiPlus® .
